item.title: Fillup
item.description: WIP: The manual and documentation: https://shorturl.at/kuX29 The game layout: The empty playing board All basic items tokens ready to put in the game: All basic ability tokens ready to put in the game: There are 8 different abilities, each has 4 The healthboard: The player decides behind the wall what they want to do. After the deciding time is up, the wall is removed and the actions take place. Below is how the player moves corresponding to revealing their actions: (Before the action) (After the action)
